verses.name: Deuteronomy 1:28
verses.text: Whither shall we go up? our brethren have discouraged our heart, saying, The people is greater and taller than we; the cities are great and walled up to heaven; and moreover we have seen the sons of the Anakims there.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 1:29
verses.text: Then I said unto you, Dread not, neither be afraid of them.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 1:30
verses.text: The Lord your God which goeth before you, he shall fight for you, according to all that he did for you in Egypt before your eyes;
